item.title: Jane add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "I have gained this by philosophy: that I do without being commanded what others do only from fear of the law." -- Aristotle

item.title: Jane add a quote by Paul Theroux
item.description: "But art should require no instrument but memory." -- Paul Theroux

item.title: Jane add a quote by John Adams
item.description: "It should be your care, therefore, and mine, to elevate the minds of our children and exalt their courage; to accelerate and animate their industry and activity; to excite in them an habitual contempt of meanness, abhorrence of injustice and inhumanity, and an ambition to excel in every capacity, faculty, and virtue. If we suffer their minds to grovel and creep in infancy, they will grovel all their lives." -- John Adams

item.title: Jane add a quote by John Keats
item.description: "Beauty is truth; truth beauty." -- John Keats
